hero.title: Vidu Q2
hero.description: Revolutionary dual-mode AI video creation with unmatched character consistency. Generate professional anime videos and cinematic content with Turbo speed or Pro quality - featuring advanced multi-entity consistency and studio-level animation in 1080p resolution.

whatIs.title: What is Vidu Q2?
whatIs.description: Vidu Q2 is the next-generation video creation model built on Shengshu Technology's proven foundation, offering dual creation modes for versatile content production. Turbo mode delivers quick, motion-focused videos perfect for social media, while Pro mode creates richly detailed, cinematic scenes with professional-grade quality. Featuring advanced multi-entity consistency technology, Vidu Q2 maintains perfect character and object coherence across all frames, making it ideal for anime creators, marketers, and filmmakers seeking reliable, high-quality video generation up to 1080p resolution with seamless character animations.

examples.title: Vidu Q2 Examples
examples.description: Explore professional anime videos and cinematic content created with Vidu Q2's dual-mode technology. Witness smooth character movements, consistent multi-entity scenes, and studio-quality animations that showcase the power of advanced AI video generation.

steps.title: Upload Your Image
steps.content: Import your source material including character designs, scenes, or reference images. Vidu Q2's advanced recognition system analyzes multiple entities and prepares them for consistent animation across all video frames.

steps.title: Enter Your Prompt
steps.content: Describe your desired video including character actions, scene dynamics, and animation style. Specify movement details, interactions between entities, and visual effects to guide Vidu Q2's advanced character consistency and animation generation process.

steps.title: Generate Animation
steps.content: Click the 'Generate Animation' button to activate Vidu Q2's AI processing engine and watch as it creates your video with advanced character consistency technology, maintaining perfect entity coherence while delivering smooth, professional-grade animations.

steps.title: Download and Share
steps.content: Export your high-resolution video up to 1080p quality with maintained character consistency throughout. Share your professional anime content, marketing videos, or cinematic creations across any platform.

benefits.title: Why Use Vidu Q2?
benefits.description: Experience professional anime video creation with advanced character consistency, dual creation modes, and cinema-quality results.

faq.a2: Using Vidu Q2 is intuitive! First upload your images or reference materials, then select either Turbo mode for quick content or Pro mode for cinematic quality, customize your settings including character interactions, generate your video with advanced consistency technology, and download your professional result.
